document_data.name: Booga
document_data.mainbody: '''Mama Booga''' was an [[orc]] bandit and shaman of the [[Clotskull]] [[orc]] tribe in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Around [[1485 DR]], Mama Booga and her boys were hired by the [[Red Wizard of Thay]] [[Arvik Zaltos]] to steal an egg from the lair of the [[black dragon]] [[Thoss Fyurnen]]. Later, Booga and her boys awaited the Red Wizard at the ruined [[Krandon Manor]] near [[Daggerford]].
